name: ConTato by Helines
description:
"Of all the senses, vision is the most superficial. The ear, the proudest. The smell, the most voluptuous. The taste, the most fickle. And touch, the deepest. ” Diderot

Painting made with heart and soul.

This art touched me deeply! For me, this is the greatest meaning of art: to sensitize us, touch us, move us. And the amazing thing is that everyone feels the same art differently."

@napstudio.br
